pages.title: Soul Crystal
pages.text: The Soul Crystal is the catalyst for everything in Spirit. In order to begin using one, you must kill a large number of the same kind of mob. Once the crystal contains within it a particular number of souls (64 by default) your Soul Crystal will have reached tier 1. By placing it inside of a soul cage, you can begin spawning mobs

pages.name: Soul Crystal Recipe
pages.text: Form the multiblock and then throw an amethyst shard into the soul fire in order to craft your soul crystal!
